notification: Due to the lack of precise information on the location of individual cases in the latest announcements of the Ministry of Health, we are forced to limit ourselves to displaying data by voivodeship.
relevanceInfo: The author is not responsible for the relevance and correctness of the content provided. The data may be out of date.
author: Author: Konrad Kalemba
openSourceApp: The application is 'open-source' - anyone willing can directly help in the development of the project. Source code can be found at the following link:
sourceInfo: The data is updated basing on the official Twitter account of Polish Ministry of Health. Every information below is confirmed by a tweet, which can be reached by clicking on a date.
donation: The application is free to use, but not to operate. Help me by clicking the link below and donating. Thank you!
